text: Roberto Eugenio Bueno Campos (born 21 January 1946) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Veracruz. == See also == * Veracruz state election, 1994 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Veracruz Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Roberto Bueno Campos
